title: Princess Michael of Kent
summary: Princess Michael of Kent (born Baroness Marie-Christine Anna Agnes Hedwig Ida von Reibnitz, 15 January 1945[1]) is a member of the British royal family of German, Austrian, and Hungarian descent. She is married to Prince Michael of Kent, a grandson of George V. Princess Michael was an interior designer before becoming an author; she has written several books on European royalty. She carries out  lecture tours and supports her husband in his public duties.
